name: SanitariumVegetarianRecipes
0:
”Alexa, open Sanitarium vegetarian recipes.”
”Give me a vegan recipe.”
”What's for breakfast?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sanitarium vegetarian recipes
Developer Terms of Use
des:
At Sanitarium, we're here to help you live a long and healthy life. That’s why we’re helping you, with thanks to step-by-step instructions, cook some of the best vegetarian and vegan meals. With hundreds of recipes that offer inspirational serving ideas, a simple ingredients list and interactive preparation instructions; you’ll be cooking delicious, nutritious meals in no time! 

Simply start by saying ‘Alexa, open Sanitarium vegetarian recipes’. You can then search recipes by title, ingredient or meal type, hear a short description about the recipe and list ingredients and method.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
